The following cards are for sale or trade.  I will honor the first response I get for each card that commits to taking it.  

Please had $5 shipping (USPS Priority with delivery conf.) and insurance is optional at USPS cost.  I accept money orders/personal checks  and will accept Paypal if you add 3%. 

Polar Bear  T206TY COBB RED PORTRAIT10 $440
Piedmont CigarettesT206WALTER JOHNSON PORTRAIT10 $215 SOLD

Piedmont CigarettesT206MORDECAI BROWN PORTRAIT40 $160 
Piedmont CigarettesT206TY COBB BAT OFF20 $640
Piedmont CigarettesT206CY YOUNG BARE HAND20 $315

$2030 delivered takes the 5 that remain.
